page.description: The formatting string %S=BLR% is used to specify that a tree control should be displayed with the familiar boxes and lines.

argument.name: B
argument.description: Character. Optional. Indicates that open/close boxes should be displayed.

argument.name: L
argument.description: Character. Optional. Lines should be drawn on the tree control.

argument.name: R
argument.description: Character. Optional. Open/close boxes should be drawn at the root level.

argument.name: X
argument.description: Character. Optional. Causes the dialog to open with the tree control fully expanded.

section.example: dim data10 as C data1 = "a.1.A" data2 = "a.1.B" data3 = "a.2.A" data4 = "a.2.B" data5 = "b.1.A" data6 = "b.1.B" data7 = "b.2.A" data8 = "b.2.B" result=ui_dlg_box("Simple Tree",<<%dlg% {ysize=2} [%S=BLR%.32,10node^ ; .32node %dlg% )
